plan.goal: Discover the authoritative, university-hosted website or online system that publishes the complete Harvard University course catalog (or searchable course database) and explicitly supports the 2024-2025 academic year.
input_hints: web search: "Harvard FAS courses of instruction 2024-2025"
look for Harvard-owned domains such as *.harvard.edu or *.fas.harvard.edu
keywords to notice on result snippets/pages: "Course Search", "Courses of Instruction", "Catalog", "2024-2025", "my.harvard"
plan.output_criteria: Return a concise ranked list (no more than five) of candidate URLs that appear to be official Harvard University resources (same-domain pages or subdomains) providing a central catalog or database of courses and which mention, in title, URL, or page content, the 2024-2025 academic year.

plan.goal: Evaluate the candidate URLs from Step 1 to locate the single page or interface that actually allows browsing or querying courses specifically for the 2024-2025 academic year and is publicly accessible (no authentication).
input_hints: Open each candidate URL to verify Harvard branding, domain authenticity, and page accessibility
Within each site, look for UI elements or URL parameters labelled "Academic Year", "Year", "Session", or explicitly listing "2024-2025" or "2024-25"
If a drop-down or toggle exists, attempt to select or otherwise activate the 2024-2025 year filter
Prefer a view that lists all courses (or can return an unfiltered list) rather than requiring granular search terms
plan.output_criteria: Output the single URL judged most authoritative and user-accessible that presents (or can present after setting the year filter) the full list of Harvard courses for the 2024-2025 academic year, along with a brief note describing the control or parameter used to ensure the 2024-2025 filter is active.

plan.goal: Navigate within the chosen site (from Step 2) to the concrete page view that displays the individual course entries for the 2024-2025 academic year, confirming that each listed entry includes title, code, department, and description fields.
input_hints: If the interface is a search form, run a blank or broad query (e.g., no keyword, ‘All Departments’) while the 2024-2025 year filter is active to return the complete list
Scroll or paginate if necessary to ensure the page visibly contains at least several course records
Look for repeating blocks or rows where course-specific data appear (title, catalog number, department, description)
plan.output_criteria: Provide the final, fully-qualified URL (including any query parameters reflecting the 2024-2025 filter) and a clear textual description of the on-page region or results container that holds the repeating course listings. This marks the location for the subsequent extraction step.
